story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_02:
I wonder what Cyrus is trying to accomplish by
using Darkrai’s power.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_03:
Cyrus’s vision is to create a world devoid of
human spirit...
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_04:
Therefore, he must be doing this because Darkrai’s
nightmare is close to his ideal world.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_05:
You’re kidding, right? You mean he actually wants
these nightmares?!
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_06: If Darkrai’s nightmare is Cyrus’s ideal world...
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_07: Then it’s possible he’s also asleep, right?
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_09:
Falling deeper into the nightmare may be allowing
him to forge a deeper bond with Darkrai.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_10:
Cyrus could be in that nightmare, resonating with
Darkrai... All while strengthening their bond.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_11:
Unbelievable! But we know what eventually 
happens to those who fall into
Darkrai’s nightmare...
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_12: Yikes! We have to find him—quick!
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_13:
We don’t have enough info on his whereabouts...
What should we do?
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_14: Why don’t you let us in on this operation?
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_16: We’d also like to find our boss.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_17:
Don’t get the wrong idea. We’re only helping you
because your goals happen to align with ours.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_18:
After all the bad things you’ve done, you’re really
willing to help us out?
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_19:
We’re not playing around. We’ll do anything to get
our boss back.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_23: You sure we should team up with Team Galactic?
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_24:
Uh-huh. Everyone worries about the people they
care about. It has nothing to do with good or evil.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_25:
I’m with you, Dawn. We’ll need their help if we
want Cyrus to change.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_26: I believe that you all care deeply for Cyrus.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_27: Thank you. You have our full cooperation.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_28: However, you need to follow our rules.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_29:
No straying from the group. You’ll stay with
at least one of us while we’re out and about.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_30:
Hmph. So you wanna babysit us, huh?
Go right ahead.
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_34:
You can’t go to sleep, Professor! You’ll fall right
into Darkrai’s nightmare!
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_36:
I know...you can do it...
I...believe...
story_teamgalactic_02_04000/2401_1201_39:
Let’s go. We have to find Cyrus—for the
professor’s sake, too!
